main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the EU's index of tenders to extract basic information and detailed PDFs.

main_features.name: Adminer Integration
main_features.description: Provides a web-based interface for managing the PostgreSQL database of tender calls.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Displays real-time system status, scraping statistics, and tender analysis results with pagination and auto-update features.

corrective_actions.solution: Import declarative_base from SQLAlchemy in the models.py file.
